featured.text: Many of his works—depictions of children at play and in school, farm girls attending to their work, hunters and their prey—have become classic images of nineteenth-century American life.
His pictures vividly portrayed the life of nineteenth-century Americans.
In the late nineteenth century, the Swiss army issued its soldiers a gun that required a special screwdriver to dismantle and clean it.
As tea became much cheaper during the nineteenth century, its popularity spread right through all corners of the British society.
According to the passage, which of the following is true? (A) High tea was served later in the day than afternoon tea in the nineteenth century.

definition.zh_def: 第十九的，表示順序中的第十九位。
definition.en_def: The ordinal number corresponding to the number 19 in a sequence.
definition.example: She finished in nineteenth place in the race.
